eqcorrscan.core.match_filter.read_detections¶

eqcorrscan.core.match_filter.read_detections(fname)[source]¶

Read detections from a file to a list of DETECTION objects.

Parameters:fname (str) File to read from, must be a file written to by DETECTION.write.
Returns:list of eqcorrscan.core.match_filter.DETECTION
Return type:list

Note

eqcorrscan.core.match_filter.DETECTION‘s returned do not contain DETECTION.event
